d:
A Winx Club comic made by Inuyuru, commissioned by someone who wants to remain anonymous

Disclaimer: The anonymous commissioner and writer of this comic, the artist of this comic, or I, the uploader of this comic, do not own Winx Club

Please help support Inuyuru
https://twitter.com/inuyurusamakun?lang=en
https://www.patreon.com/Inuyuru

Although the writer wants to remain anonymous, they appreciate any monetary donation to help them financially
To find their ko-fi account go to this link
https://www.deviantart.com/samuraidemonslayer9/journal/Anonymous-comic-writer-877860647
